sections.heading: Purposes10-301.PurposesSubject to any limitations or requirements contained in its articles of incorporation or in any other applicable law, a corporation shall have the purpose of engaging in and may engage in any lawful business activity
sections.text: Purposes10-301.PurposesSubject to any limitations or requirements contained in its articles of incorporation or in any other applicable law, a corporation shall have the purpose of engaging in and may engage in any lawful business activity.
